DOCNAME: CASE OF JANOS LAKATOS v. HUNGARY
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE CARDINAL plaintiffs brought an action in trespass against the applicant before ORG . After several hearings , a judgment was given on DATE . On CARDINAL DATE PERSON Regional Court quashed this decision and remitted the case .

CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings several hearings took place . On DATE ORG delivered a partial judgment . On appeal , on DATE ORG suspended the proceedings pending the adjudication of those claims which were unaffected by the partial judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG held a hearing . On DATE it suspended the proceedings pending the termination , on DATE , of a related land registry dispute .

CARDINAL . Upon the resumption of the case on DATE another hearing was held and an expert appointed . The expert opinion was submitted on DATE . DATE and DATE the proceedings were again suspended pending the termination of related administrative proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG adopted a partial judgment concerning damages . On appeal , on DATE ORG partly upheld the first instance decision while remitting some claims .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first instance proceedings continued . Another expert was appointed who filed his opinion on DATE . On DATE and DATE further hearings took place .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG gave judgment , finding partly for the plaintiffs . On appeal , on DATE ORG heard the parties and appointed an expert who filed his opinion on CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG gave judgment . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's petition for review .
